donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr: Small farm/agri workers more equitably integr. in dom & int'l value/supp chains of HC products, Entrepr. forms of org. est. by small farm, Policy/regulatory changes promote propoor priv sec growth in Upper Egy's HC sector identified & discussed w/ GOE

project_descr: The purpose of the programme is to promote viable equitable partnerships between small farmers and private sector investors in efficient pro-poor horticulture value chains in three locations in the poorest Upper Egyptian Governorates
project_title: Pro-Poor Horticulture Value Chains in Upper Egypt
